ygData.messageBody:
>From: Snicker <snicker@...>
>
>General call for the following information:
>1) Are there currently any bards using any two-handed weapons (slashing or
>blunt)?
>2) Are there any Bards who have had any luck with advancing their
>hand-to-hand skill, and if so, how, and how far?
>
>This was brought to my attention by someone who pointed out that, although
>we have the skills listed on our "training sheet" we can't actually train
>any two-handers.


This is correct. Our max skill in 2h is 1. We have 2h skill simply so that
GM bards can utilize the special GM items (locator staff, etc.)
This is what a friend of mine who guides on some server told me.

Linako
